pkgmetadata.longdescription: # MinefobMinefob is a Python module that provides full controlover any Minehut server by utilizing the Minehut API## InstallationUse the package manager [pip](https://pypi.org/project/minefob) to install Minefob.```bashpip install minefob```## Usage```pythonfrom minefob import Minefob# Instantiate a new instance of the Minefob class and provide it with# Minehut account email, password, and server namem = Minefob("foo_foo@example.domain", "123456789", "my_server")m.awaken() # starts serverm.say("Hello Word") # says "Hello World" in server chatm.slumber(10) # gives a ten second countdown before kicking players, # saving the world, and shutting down the server```## ContributingPull requests are welcome. For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change.## License[MIT](https://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit/)
